title: 3D Pose Estimation with ml5.js
description: In this video, I substitute the MoveNet model with the BlazePose model, showing how to track #D body keypoints and visualize 'skeleton' connections using recorded video.

Use scale() to expand range of x, y, z values

codeExamples.title: BlazePose Lerp
codeExamples.description: Sketch demonstrating use of BlazePose model with lerp smoothing.

links.title: Custom Shapes
links.description: In this video, I look at how to draw "custom" shapes in p5.js, using, `beginShape()`, `endShape()`, `vertex()` and `curveVertex().

links.title: Translate, Rotate, Push/Pop
links.description: In this video I cover the functions translate(), rotate(), push() and pop().
